mapper.sql: WITH LST AS ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER () RNUM FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_IDX, A.BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR (A.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, A.MOD_ID, TO_CHAR (A.MOD_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MOD_DT, A.BOARD_TYPE, A.USE_YN, A.SVC_ID, A.HIT, ( SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_SYS_CD_INFO WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'ST001' AND CD_ID = A.BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE AND USE_YN = 'Y') BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE_NM FROM TB_STO_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_IDX = #{BOARD_IDX} AND A.BOARD_TYPE = #{BOARD_TYPE}

SELECT noti.BOARD_IDX, noti.BOARD_TYPE, noti.BOARD_TITLE, noti.BOARD_CONTENT, noti.REG_ID, TO_CHAR (noti.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT, noti.MOD_ID, TO_CHAR (noti.MOD_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MOD_DT, noti.BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE, noti.USE_YN, NVL(noti.SVC_ID,'1') SVC_ID, noti.HIT, ( SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_SYS_CD_INFO WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'ST001' AND CD_ID = noti.BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE AND USE_YN = 'Y') BOARD_DETAIL_TYPE_NM FROM TB_STO_BOARD noti
USE_YN = 'Y' AND noti.BOARD_TYPE = #{BOARD_TYPE}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{BOARD_TITLE} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{BOARD_CONTENT} || '%'
ORDER BY noti.REG_DT DESC
SELECT B.CD_ID, B.CD_NM FROM TB_SYS_CD_GRP A, TB_SYS_CD_INFO B WHERE A.CD_GRP_ID = #{commonCode} AND A.CD_GRP_ID = B.CD_GRP_ID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0)+1, 10 , '0') AS BOARD_IDX FROM TB_STO_BOARD

SELECT A.FILE_IDX, A.FILE_PATH,A.FILE_NAME, A.FILE_SAVE_NAME, A.FILE_EXT, A.FILE_SIZE, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, A.STS_CD, B.SVC_ID, A.BOARD_IDX FROM TB_STO_FILE A, TB_STO_BOARD B WHERE A.BOARD_IDX = #{BOARD_IDX} AND A.BOARD_IDX = B.BOARD_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STO_FILE (FILE_IDX, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_SAVE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, REG_DT, REG_ID, BOARD_IDX) VALUES (SEQ_TB_STO_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SAVE_NAME}, #{FILE_EXT}, #{FILE_SIZE}, (CURRENT TIMESTAMP), #{REG_ID}, #{BOARD_IDX})
